Vlad shows a big grin at this notion. He is not cocky enough to feel 
he is absolutely going to be victorious, but he knew his own stength.

Vlad: I feel honored that you challenge me to a Trial of Possession. 
(He points to a small plateau 50 meters from there) We shall fight 
there, on that plateau. As it will be our circle of equals, the first 
one to get out of the combat area loses. I suggest we fight in robot 
mode, do you agree?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> ??????::
> 
> The femme bot laughed and said "First we're better without that 
idiot 
> and second..."her tone changed and said "I'm happy to be my own boss 
> but I'm interested to join to Tripedocus... but I challenge you for 
a 
> posession trial... the winner is the boss... Agree?"
